nice_to_have_skills: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer Associate (DP-203)
responsibilities: Design and implement modern data platforms using Azure tools.
Build and maintain ETL/ELT pipelines to ingest data from various sources.
Develop and optimize data models and data warehouses.
Leverage Azure Databricks and Spark for advanced data transformation and processing.
Integrate external APIs and real-time data streams.
Implement and manage data governance, security, and access controls.
Monitor, troubleshoot, and improve data pipeline performance and reliability.
Work closely with data scientists, analysts, and business teams to enable self-service analytics.
requirements: 3+ years of hands-on experience as a Data Engineer on Azure cloud platform.
Proficient in Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure SQL, and Data Lake Storage Gen2.
Strong SQL skills and experience with performance tuning and query optimization.
Experience with big data tools such as Databricks, PySpark, and HDInsight.
Familiarity with CI/CD for data pipelines using Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
Strong understanding of data architecture, metadata management, and data governance.
Proficient in Python, Scala, or PowerShell for data operations scripting.
education_required: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or related field
